Structs/DeviceCommand.html#/s:9ThinCloud.name: request
Structs/DeviceCommand.html#/s:9ThinCloud.abstract: Key-value pairs of customer specified incoming request data.

Structs/DeviceCommand.html#/s:9ThinCloud.name: response
Structs/DeviceCommand.html#/s:9ThinCloud.abstract: Key-value pairs of customer specified outgoing response data.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Device.name: physicalId
Structs/Device.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Device.abstract: The physical identifier of the device, i.e. MAC address.

Structs/Device.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Device.name: location
Structs/Device.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Device.abstract: The GeoJSON represenation of the device’s location

Structs/Device.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Device.name: connectivityUpdateAt
Structs/Device.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Device.abstract: Date the connectivity state was last updated at.

Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.name: applicationName
Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.abstract: The reverse-DNS style bundle identifier of the application.

Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.name: deviceModel
Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.abstract: The model of the mobile device associated with the client.

Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.name: deviceVersion
Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.abstract: The platform version of the mobile device.

Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.name: deviceToken
Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.abstract: The push token of the mobile device. On Apple platforms, this is the APNs token.

Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.name: installId
Structs/Client.html#/s:9ThinCloud6Client.abstract: The unique ID of the mobile device associated with the client. On Apple platforms, this is identifierForVendor.

Structs/AnyEncodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.name: description
Structs/AnyEncodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.abstract: A string representation of the encodable object.

Structs/AnyEncodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.name: debugDescription
Structs/AnyEncodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.abstract: Returns a string that describes the contents of the receiver for presentation in the debugger.

Structs/AnyDecodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.name: description
Structs/AnyDecodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.abstract: A string representation of the decodable object.

Structs/AnyDecodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.name: debugDescription
Structs/AnyDecodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud1.abstract: Returns a string that describes the contents of the receiver for presentation in the debugger.

Structs/AnyCodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud10A.name: description
Structs/AnyCodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud10A.abstract: A string representation of the codable object.

Structs/AnyCodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud10A.name: debugDescription
Structs/AnyCodable.html#/s:9ThinCloud10A.abstract: Returns a string that describes the contents of the receiver for presentation in the debugger.

Structs/Client.html.name: Client
Structs/Client.html.abstract: Representation of a client stored in ThinCloud.

Structs.html#/s:9ThinCloud19DeviceCreate.name: DeviceCreateRequest
Structs.html#/s:9ThinCloud19DeviceCreate.abstract: Representation of a device creation request to ThinCloud.

Structs.html#/s:9ThinCloud19DeviceUpdate.name: DeviceUpdateRequest
Structs.html#/s:9ThinCloud19DeviceUpdate.abstract: Representation of a device update request to ThinCloud.

Structs/Device.html.name: Device
Structs/Device.html.abstract: Representation of a device stored in ThinCloud.

Structs.html#/s:9ThinCloud17UserUpdateRe.name: UserUpdateRequest
Structs.html#/s:9ThinCloud17UserUpdateRe.abstract: Representation of a user update request to ThinCloud.

Structs/User.html.name: User
Structs/User.html.abstract: Representation of a user stored in ThinCloud.

Protocols/VirtualGatewayDelegate.html.name: VirtualGatewayDelegate
Protocols/VirtualGatewayDelegate.html.abstract: The protocol required to receive ThinCloud Virtual Gateway device commands.

Enums/ThinCloudError.html#/s:9ThinCloud0.name: notAuthenticated
Enums/ThinCloudError.html#/s:9ThinCloud0.abstract: A call was made to a resource that requires authentication.

Enums/ThinCloudError.html#/s:9ThinCloud0.name: responseError
Enums/ThinCloudError.html#/s:9ThinCloud0.abstract: The ThinCloud backend returned an unexpected response.

Enums/ThinCloudError.html#/s:9ThinCloud0.name: deserializationError
Enums/ThinCloudError.html#/s:9ThinCloud0.abstract: The ThinCloud backend returned a payload that could not be deserialized from JSON.

Classes/VirtualGateway.html#/s:9ThinClou.name: delegate
Classes/VirtualGateway.html#/s:9ThinClou.abstract: The VirtualGatewayDelegate responsible for handling incoming ThinCloud Virtual Gateway commands.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: currentUser
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: The user signed in to the ThinCloud instance. If nil, no user is signed in.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: currentClient
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: The client of the user associated with the current ThinCloud instance. If nil, no user is signed in.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC9.name: configure(instance:clientId:apiKey:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC9.abstract: Configures the ThinCloud singleton with your deployment and client keys.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC6.name: signIn(email:password:completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC6.abstract: Signs in a user creating a session inside the ThinCloud singleton.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC7.name: signOut()
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC7.abstract: Signs out the user session inside the ThinCloud singleton.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: verifyResetPassword(email:password:confirmationCode:completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: Verifies a password change of a user.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC2.name: resendUserVerification(email:completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC2.abstract: Resends a verification e-mail to new user.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC7.name: getUser(completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC7.abstract: Fetches the signed in user associated with the ThinCloud SDK instance.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: updateUser(_:completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: Updates a the signed in user associated with the ThinCloud SDK instance.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: deleteUser(completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: Deletes the current user associated with the ThinCloud SDK instance.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: getDevices(completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: Fetches all devices associated with the current user.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC9.name: getDevice(deviceId:completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC9.abstract: Fetches a specified device by its deviceId.

Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.name: getClients(completion:)
Classes/ThinCloud.html#/s:9ThinCloudAAC1.abstract: Fetches all clients associated with the current user.

Classes/ThinCloud.html.name: ThinCloud
Classes/ThinCloud.html.abstract: General container responsible for retaining the ThinCloud and VirtualGateway instances.

Classes/VirtualGateway.html.name: VirtualGateway
Classes/VirtualGateway.html.abstract: The ThinCloud Virtual Gateway wraps APNs to provide command forwarding for your devices.
